title: Vanilla cupcakes with vanilla frosting
ingredients: ['160g softened butter or margarine', '160g caster sugar', '3 medium eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '160g self-raising flour, sieved', '1 to 2 tablespoons milk, or as needed', 'For vanilla frosting ingredients', '110g softened butter or margarine', '320g icing sugar, sieved', '2 to 3 tablespoons milk, or as needed', '2 to 3 drops vanilla extract']
